text: Exhibitionism is a behavior done to attract attention. In everyday life, extroverts may be exhibitionists. As a symptom of histrionic personality disorder, exhibitionism is the pleasure a person feels by showing their breasts, genitals or buttocks to strangers to shock or frighten them. Less severe forms of exhibitionism are mooning, streaking and flashing. ==Related pages== * Voyeurism ==References== Category:Nudity Category:Human sexuality
title: Exhibitionism
